#summary $.language(text OR array, options)
#labels Featured

==Options==

Override defaults with: `$.language.defaults={}`

The result object: http://code.google.com/apis/ajaxlanguage/documentation/reference.html#detectResult

 * start: function(){}
 * each: function(){}
   * arguments: i, langCode, language, result
 * complete: function(){}
   * arguments: array<langCode>, array<language>, array<result>
 * error: function(){}
   * arguments: result.error
 * limit: 500
   * character limit (the detection is called only for the first part of the strings)
